article.title: Non-reciprocal Light-harvesting Nanoantennae Made by Nature

multiple_choice_question.text: Which type of antenna is depicted in Figure 1(a)?
What does the variable \'d\' represent in Figure 2(b)?
choices: The radius of the loop antenna
The length of the short linear dipoles

multiple_choice_question.text: What structural symmetry does the LH2 complex from Rhodospirillum molischianum (1LGH) exhibit?
What does Equation (7) describe in the context of the article?
choices: The electric field strength of a resonant-loop antenna
The power received by a small-loop antenna
The magnetic field strength of a small-loop antenna in a vacuum
The radiation resistance of a loop antenna
